name: pngdowner
description:
pngdowner is malware used by Putter Panda. It is a simple tool with limited functionality and no persistence mechanism, suggesting it is used only as a simple "download-and-
execute" utility. (Citation: CrowdStrike Putter Panda)

Aliases: pngdowner

external_references.description: Crowdstrike Global Intelligence Team. (2014, June 9). CrowdStrike Intelligence Report: Putter Panda. Retrieved January 22, 2016.

name: pwdump
description:
pwdump is a credential dumper. (Citation: Wikipedia pwdump)

Aliases: pwdump

name: route
description:
route can be used to find or change information within the local system IP routing table. (Citation: TechNet Route)

Aliases: route, route.exe

name: schtasks
description:
schtasks is used to schedule execution of programs or scripts on a Windows system to run at a specific date and time. (Citation: TechNet Schtasks)

Aliases: schtasks, schtasks.exe

name: spwebmember
description:
spwebmember is a Microsoft SharePoint enumeration and data dumping tool written in .NET. (Citation: NCC Group APT15 Alive and Strong)

Aliases: spwebmember

external_references.description: Smallridge, R. (2018, March 10). APT15 is alive and strong: An analysis of RoyalCli and RoyalDNS. Retrieved April 4, 2018.
external_references.source_name: NCC Group APT15 Alive and Strong

name: sqlmap
description:
sqlmap is an open source penetration testing tool that can be used to automate the process of detecting and exploiting SQL injection flaws. (Citation: sqlmap Introduction)

Aliases: sqlmap

external_references.description: Damele, B., Stampar, M. (n.d.). sqlmap. Retrieved March 19, 2018.

name: xCmd
description:
(Citation: xCmd) is an open source tool that is similar to PsExec and allows the user to execute applications on remote systems. (Citation: xCmd)

Aliases:  (Citation: xCmd)

external_references.description: Rayaprolu, A.. (2011, April 12). xCmd an Alternative to PsExec. Retrieved August 10, 2016.
